name: Chapter 12: The Grand Theory
short_description: Sarah presents her Grand Theory of Magi-Tech Harmony to the magical scientific community. It promises to bridge the gap between old and new magical practices. While many are impressed, a radical group sees this as a threat to their power and plots to stop Sarah.
